Package org.eso.ias.plugin

Java API for writing IAS plugins.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChangeValueListener
    The interface for the listener of changes in a monitored value.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DetailedStatsCollector
    Collects detailed statistics about updated of monitor point values.
    MonitoredValue
    A MonitoredValue is a monitor point value or alarm red from the controlled system.
    Plugin
    The main class to write IAS plugins.
    Sample
    A sample of the value read from the remote system.
    Statistics
    Collects and publishes detailed statistics.
    ValueToSend
    The value to send to the core of the IAS.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AlarmSample
    AlarmSample represents an alarm generated by a remote monitored system.
    OperationalMode
    Th eoperational mode of a monitor point value
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PluginException
    The exception returned by the Plugin
